name: BeatShape
description:
Beatshape, A Game In The Works For 10 Months, Has Finally Been Released.

Features:

  • You Can Play Maps Without Downloading Them
  • You Can Upload Maps.
  • You can Use Accounts
  • You Can View Leaderboards if logged in

Coming Soon:

  • Switchchat Support

Enjoy!

Keybinds: DFJK

Known Bugs:

  1. Song First load Desync'd
  2. First load Never Works
